did.unittitle: Records of Edinburgh University Students' Association

physdesc.label: Extent and Medium of the Unit of Description

did.origination: University of Edinburgh | Edinburgh University Students' Association, University of Edinburgh | Students Representative Council

bioghist.head: Administrative/Biographical History
bioghist.p: Edinburgh University Students' Association (EUSA) is comprised of the Students' Representative Council (SRC), founded in 1884 by Robert Fitzroy Bell, the Edinburgh University Union (EUU), which was founded by the SRC in 1889, and the Edinburgh University Chambers Street Union. A later merger, in 1989, brought the Kings' Buildings Union into the Association.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Student Clubs and societies are considered to be wholly autonomous organisations. As such, their records are dealt with as private gifts or deposits.

note.p: Administrative history compiled using article Edinburgh University Students' Association, from Wikipedia, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edinburgh_University_Students'_Association, accessed 28 November 2006

physdesc.label: Extent and Medium of the Unit of Description

did.origination: University of Edinburgh | Students Representative Council

bioghist.head: Administrative/Biographical History
bioghist.p: The Students' Representative Council (SRC) was founded in 1884 by Robert Fitzroy Bell and gained statutory recogition in the Universities (Scotland) Act, 1889. It has responsibility for representation on teaching and learning, welfare, academic services, postgraduate affairs and external affairs and also for running Freshers' Week.
In 1889 it established the University Union and it has also been responsible for the publication of The Student newspaper and (until recently) the Student Handbook.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p:
Records of:
SRC minutes (15 volumes) 1884-1956
Executive Committee minutes (11 volumes) 1884-1947
Reports of Standing Committees (1 volume) 1889-1899
Womenâ€™s Committee minutes (1 volume) 1889-1912
International Academic Committee minutes (1 volume) 1898-1919
International Universities Committee minutes (1 volume) 1895-1907
Amusements Committee minutes (1 volume) 1898-1905
Annual Reports (3 volumes) 1884-1913
The Student
Student Handbook

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to more recent volumes of minutes may be restricted under the Data Protection Act.
